body: This is the intelligence score of the black blade. It starts at 10 and increases by 1 for every two levels of the bladebound magus (at 3rd level, 5th level, and so on).
name: Intelligence
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Magus/Magus Archetypes/Bladebound/Black Blades/Black Blade Basics/Intelligence
